promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical gorilla normal-type pokemon holding a ornate whip. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Whipvault, a a massive mythical gorilla normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Fur Attack, Turn the Tables. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "normal" or "Whipvault". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, gorilla-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This colossal arboreal titan is elusive, nesting in hilltop hamlets. With its luxurious pelt, it initiates Fur Attack, and can suddenly reverse the situation using Turn the Tables.
